title: 1 Bedroom Apt - Your New Home is Waiting for You!
posting_body: > Check out the video walkthroughs of our community!
If you are interested in an in-person tour, give us a call or email at any time.
Please use the link in this ad to check-out our video tours & see options to contact us directly.
Welcome home to Pinewood Apartments – Where quality & affordability meet.
Our community features a cozy clubhouse, fitness center, outdoor swimming pool, picnic & grilling areas, on-site laundry, and well-maintained grounds & landscaping.
Furthermore, our in-home amenities can’t be beat, which include large bedrooms with walk-in closet(s), separate living & dining areas, kitchen breakfast bar & pantry, and much more!
Pinewood residents truly get the best of both worlds.
Don’t wait - Reserve your spacious 1, 2 or 3 bedroom apartment home today!
We'll remain available to connect with you by phone or email.
Upon arrival, please knock & wait for entry.
- Renovated Clubhouse & Activity Center - COMING SOON!
- New Kitchen & Bathroom Granite Countertops - COMING SOON!
- New Kitchen Sink & Faucet - COMING SOON!
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Pinewood participates in an affordable housing program.
Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $37,860 | 2 Occupants: $43,260 | 3
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
